author: cbs8
title: Are you one of the finalists? Seatrade Announces Finalists for the 8th Seatrade Maritime Awards Asia
text:
Seatrade Communications
SINGAPORE , Sept. 7, Seatrade, a leading global maritime publisher and event organiser, has announced the shortlist of finalists for the 8 th Seatrade Maritime Awards Asia. These 54 finalists have convinced an independent panel of judges of their well-deserving achievements amidst tough operating conditions, shining brightly like stars in a dark night.
"We received a huge number of nominations and entries this year", said Marcus Hand , Seatrade Maritime News Asia Editor and Chairman of the Judging Panel. "The quality of the submissions were impressive and reflected the steely resolve of the maritime industry to rise above the challenges and constantly improve and out-perform itself." Close to 100 submissions were received, vying for a spot within the 12 open award categories.
For the first time, the Seatrade Maritime Awards Asia will be held in conjunction with the Hong Kong Logistics and Maritime Weeks, as a partner event of the Asian Logistics and Maritime Conference. To be hosted by international news journalist Sharanjit Leyl , the awards gala dinner will be held on Monday, 16 November 2015 at the Convention Hall of the Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre. Award winners will be announced at the black tie gala dinner which is expected to be attended by close to 500 maritime and logistics industry executives. The highlight of the evening will be the presentation of special awards including the Seatrade Lifetime Achievement Award which had been presented to a very select few to honour individuals for their significant and lasting contributions to the maritime industry in Asia.
Visit www.seatradeasiaawards.com for more information about the Seatrade Maritime Awards Asia and how you can book your dinner place.
Appendix : Shortlist of finalists and judging panel
2014 Awards Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bBI_EUiTf6Y
For more information, please contact:
Daphne Yuen
Email: dyuen@seatrade-asia.com
DID: +65-6922-3740
About Seatrade
Seatrade provides a range of global events, websites and publications that covers every aspect of the cruise and maritime industries, bringing together key people to encourage innovation and to produce powerful learning, networking and promotional platforms. Founded in 1970, Seatrade was acquired recently in 2014 by UBM, the world's second largest media and event organiser. Seatrade sits with the UBM EMEA, which connects people and creates opportunities for companies to develop new business, meet customers, launch new products, promote brands and expand markets. Operating in over 23 countries, UBM EMEA organizes many of the world's largest, most important exhibitions, conferences, awards, directories, websites and publications in a wide variety of industries.
Find out more about Seatrade and UBM, Visit http://www.seatrade-global.com/seatrade-global-information/about-seatrade.html and http://ubmemea.com/ .
